name: Holey Moley
description:
Holey Moley is a simple to play, fast-paced game where you smack moles about with hammers, pretty simple stuff, 3 modes of play including:

Quick PlayHit as many moles as you can in 60 secondsSurvivalSurvive the Moley Onslaught and defend yourself with power-ups!No-MissYou miss a hit, you die, simple as that!

Each play mode has 3 different difficulty settings which ramp up as the player progresses to keep the game challenging at all levels.

Joypad and Mouse Supported, 1 and 2 Player Modes Available

This works across each play mode and really adds to the tension. 2

players can share the same controller for true head to head gaming or

use seperate controllers instead.
